adrFormatAddress: 2121 Broadway, New York, NY 10023, USA

editorialSummary.text: This gym & activities center for children offers gymnastics, dance & karate classes among others.

originalText.text:
Iâ€™ve been taking my children to the little gym for a very long time & I usually have nothing but amazing things to say but recently I noticed an employee there getting mistreated. This girl is so sweet with my kids. They love her, yet every time I pick my kids up I see the same employee getting treated unfairly, I overheard management or a coworker reprimanding her in a way I thought was belittling & I was so shocked. This isnâ€™t the little gym Iâ€™ve grown to know & love. Things are different now & I actually love all of you but the mistreatment of your employees that actually really love their job is simply unacceptable. I hope this doesnâ€™t cause trouble for the girl but I really just wouldnâ€™t feel right if I didnâ€™t speak up. Please change the way you are treating your employees. I love taking my kids to the gym but if this continues to go on I donâ€™t think Iâ€™d feel safe leaving my children around a hostile environment.

~ A concerned parent.

originalText.text: My daughter just had her 6th birthday party at the Little Gym and it was wonderful! It was a very big group (35 kids for a dropoff party) and the staff ran the whole event so smoothly!  It was so much fun!  The planning process was also great - Sarah (the director) is so responsive and easy to work with.  I highly recommend. It!

It was so much fun!  The planning process was also great - Sarah (the director) is so responsive and easy to work with.  I highly recommend. It!

originalText.text:
The entire team at Little Gym UWS has created a safe, loving, and open environment for our children.

The commitment and patience they demonstrate is unrivaled.

This is a fun place for kids to be kids, make mistakes, tumble, grow, and thrive.

Little Gym staff take the time to get to know our children, meet them where they are and recognize their progress against their own benchmarks.

I am eternally grateful for their ability to see my child as a child and an individual in a world that is often filled with those who talk the talk but don't walk the walk on being child-centered.

originalText.text: We have attended classes in the past and just held my daughter's 4th birthday at The Little Gym. The party was so much fun for all of the kids, they got to run, dance and try different gymnastics moves for the activity portion of the party. I LOVED the coaches especially Brandon and it was great that they were so flexible letting us use our own playlist for the party area and bring in any food we wanted. We are already thinking we'll have the 5th birthday party here!
